title: "AI model may help epilepsy patients become seizure-free"
excerpt: "A study led by Monash University and believed to be a world first has demonstrated that an Artificial Intelligence (AI) model can potentially predict the best personalized, anti-seizure medication for patients with newly diagnosed epilepsy."
